dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Possibly illegal content on one of your hosted sites]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 2004 3:41 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Possibly illegal content on one of your hosted sites]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Possibly illegal content on one of your hosted sites
Date: Mon, 13 Dec 2004 21:37:25 -0800 (PST)
From: Olaf Tipster <olaftipster@yahoo.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com

Hello!

I believe one of websites hosted within your network
may have illegal content on it (I might be wrong
though). I have included some information about it
below. I believe you have the resources and knowledge
that will allow you to properly address the issue and
determine whether the content is illegal and thus
further action is necessary. I am including IP
address, hostname and WHOIS record information for the
website in question. Thank you.

Hostname: WWW.CRAZYHOLES.COM
IP address: 67.19.220.66

WHOIS record information:
Registrant:
~ Hospicegirls
~ Mikulina str 25
~ Kiyv, Kiyv 41157
~ UA
~ 06724343258


Domain Name: CRAZYHOLES.COM

Administrative Contact:
~ Molik, Boris negrvolk@yahoo.com
~ Mikulina str 25
~ Kiyv, Kiyv 41157
~ UA
~ 06724343258


Technical Contact:
~ Molik, Boris negrvolk@yahoo.com
~ Mikulina str 25
~ Kiyv, Kiyv 41157
~ UA
~ 06724343258


Record last updated 06-09-2004 01:17:13 AM
Record expires on 08-02-2005
Record created on 08-02-2002

Domain servers in listed order:
        NS0.PQCSERVICE.NET        67.18.35.218
        NS1.PQCSERVICE.NET        65.75.162.110





__________________________________
Do you Yahoo!?
Take Yahoo! Mail with you! Get it on your mobile phone.
http://mobile.yahoo.com/maildemo
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
